channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 随着经济放缓，一些中国年轻人放弃了企业工作，转而追求“自我时间”
item.description: Faced with diminishing job prospects as the economy slows, Chu Yi is choosing to "lie flat", a Chinese term used to describe people who work just enough to afford to spend their time on what they enjoy.翻译:面对经济放缓带来的就业前景黯淡，褚毅选择“平躺”，这是一个中文术语，用来形容那些工作只够花时间做自己喜欢的事情的人。
item.author: Nicoco Chan

item.title: 澳大利亚富邑酒业 (Treasury Wine) 利润与预期同步上涨；中国关税审查成为焦点
item.description: Shares of Treasury Wine Estates scaled a three-month high on Thursday after the company's core profit met expectations, with focus shifting to an upcoming Chinese review of tariffs on Australian winemakers.翻译:周四，富邑葡萄酒庄园 (Treasury Wine Estates) 的核心利润达到预期，其股价升至三个月高位，焦点转向中国即将对澳大利亚酿酒商征收关税的审查。
item.author: Poonam Behura

item.title: 美国贸易长官在世贸组织会议上寻求渐进式改革
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai said on Wednesday that she is taking a "pragmatic" approach to the World Trade Organization's next ministerial meeting, aiming for incremental but meaningful improvements that sustain the trade body's reform momentum.翻译:美国贸易代表戴凯瑟琳周三表示，她正在对世界贸易组织下一次部长级会议采取“务实”态度，旨在实现渐进但有意义的改进，以维持该贸易组织的改革势头。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本 GDP 即将到来，日元触及 150.00/美元
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 部分大众汽车因中国零件在美国港口延误
item.description: Volkswagen said on Wednesday it expected to resolve by the end of March delays in the delivery of thousands of vehicles held up at U.S. ports due to a customs problem.翻译:大众汽车周三表示，预计将在 3 月底之前解决因海关问题而滞留在美国港口的数千辆汽车的交付延误问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受中国和巴西推动，EssilorLuxottica 第四季度收入增长 7.1%
item.description: Revenue at eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica rose 7.1% at constant exchange rates in the last quarter of 2023 boosted by China and Brazil, reaching 6.25 billion euros ($6.7 billion).翻译:在中国和巴西的推动下，眼镜制造商 EssilorLuxottica 的收入（按固定汇率计算）在 2023 年最后一个季度增长了 7.1%，达到 62.5 亿欧元（67 亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国表示北约主席斯托尔滕贝格敦促美国众议院通过对乌克兰的援助
item.description: NATO boss Jens Stoltenberg urged the U.S. House of Representatives on Wednesday to pass a "vital" multi-billion dollar military aid package for Ukraine, telling lawmakers that China would be emboldened if Russia wins its war.翻译:北约主席延斯·斯托尔滕贝格周三敦促美国众议院通过一项针对乌克兰的“至关重要的”数十亿美元军事援助计划，他告诉议员们，如果俄罗斯赢得战争，中国将更加大胆。
item.author: Andrew Gray, Johnny Cotton

item.title: 罗纳尔多在亚洲联赛 16 强中帮助阿尔·纳斯尔取得优势
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo broke Al-Fayha's resistance nine minutes from time to give Al-Nassr a 1-0 win over fellow Saudi Pro League side in the first leg of their Asian Champions League last 16 clash in Riyadh on Wednesday.翻译:周三在利雅得举行的亚洲冠军联赛 16 强首回合比赛中，克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多 (Cristiano Ronaldo) 在九分钟内打破了阿尔·法耶哈 (Al-Fayha) 的抵抗，帮助阿尔·纳斯尔 (Al-Nassr) 以 1-0 战胜沙特职业联赛球队。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 菲律宾在西部海域部署军舰“维护海洋利益”
item.description: The Philippines has deployed a warship off the waters of Palawan island facing the South China Sea to "protect its maritime interests", a senior navy official said, in a move that may irk China.翻译:一名高级海军官员表示，菲律宾在面向南海的巴拉望岛海域部署了一艘军舰，以“保护其海上利益”，此举可能会激怒中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 文件显示，世贸组织上诉法院危机无法得到解决
item.description: A draft proposal on reforming the World Trade Organization leaves open the question of resolving the organisation's broken appeals bench and asks trade ministers to decide later this month, according to documents seen by Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:据路透社周三看到的文件显示，一项关于改革世界贸易组织的提案草案留下了解决该组织破碎的上诉法庭问题的悬而未决的问题，并要求贸易部长们在本月晚些时候做出决定。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 微软表示，它利用其人工智能工具捕获了来自中国、俄罗斯和伊朗的黑客
item.description: State-backed hackers from Russia, China, and Iran have been using tools from Microsoft-backed OpenAI to hone their skills and trick their targets, according to a report published on Wednesday.翻译:根据周三发布的一份报告，来自俄罗斯、中国和伊朗的国家支持的黑客一直在使用微软支持的 OpenAI 的工具来磨练他们的技能并欺骗他们的目标。
item.author: Raphael Satter

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着市场的反弹，“无法着陆”的情况不断发生
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特使表示美国支持日本推动与朝鲜对话
item.description: The United States supports Japan's efforts to hold talks with North Korea and hopes any dialogue would seek to resolve issues ranging from regional security to human rights, Washington's envoy on North Korean human rights issues said on Wednesday.翻译:华盛顿朝鲜人权问题特使周三表示，美国支持日本与朝鲜举行会谈的努力，并希望任何对话都能寻求解决从地区安全到人权等一系列问题。
item.author: John Geddie

item.title: 世贸组织阿布扎比会议 - 利害攸关是什么？
item.description: Ministers from across the globe are convening for a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi between Feb 26.-29 to try to broker deals, including on reforming its hobbled dispute system and cutting fishing subsidies.翻译:来自世界各地的部长将于 2 月 26 日至 29 日在阿布扎比召开世界贸易组织会议，试图达成协议，包括改革其陷入困境的争端制度和削减渔业补贴。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 独家：德国对华投资创历史新高
item.description: German direct investment in China rose by 4.3% to a record high of 11.9 billion euros ($12.7 billion) last year and also increased as a share of the country's overall investment abroad, official Bundesbank data analysed by the IW institute showed.翻译:IW研究所分析的德国央行官方数据显示，去年德国对华直接投资增长4.3%，达到创纪录的119亿欧元（127亿美元），占德国对外投资总额的比重也有所增加。
item.author: Sarah Marsh

item.title: ASML表示地缘政治和新的出口限制仍然是风险
item.description: ASML , the largest supplier of equipment to computer chip makers, said on Wednesday that geopolitical tensions and any expansion of a U.S.-led campaign to restrict its exports to China remain business risks.翻译:计算机芯片制造商最大的设备供应商阿斯麦周三表示，地缘政治紧张局势以及美国主导的限制其对华出口行动的任何扩大仍然是商业风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国、美国主导的全球补充枯竭石油库存有望提振需求
item.description: A push to replenish depleted oil stocks notably in China, the United States and Europe could buoy demand and prices in coming months, analysts and traders said, as tensions in the Middle East threaten key shipping lanes.翻译:分析师和交易商表示，随着中东紧张局势威胁到主要航道，推动补充耗尽的石油库存（尤其是在中国、美国和欧洲）可能会在未来几个月提振需求和价格。
item.author: Natalie Grover, Noah Browning, Ahmad Ghaddar

item.title: 台湾报告中国在附近进行另一次“战备巡逻”
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected 14 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Wednesday.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周三发现有 14 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着交易员评估利率前景，股市上涨，美元兑日元走弱
item.description: Global stock indexes edged higher while Treasury yields slipped on Wednesday as investors tried to assess the timing of possible interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve, while the dollar eased off of a three-month peak against the yen.翻译:全球股指小幅走高，而美国国债收益率周三下滑，因投资者试图评估美联储可能降息的时机，而美元兑日元则从三个月高点回落。
item.author: Caroline Valetkevitch

item.title: 1 月份全球电动汽车销量同比增长 69%，较 12 月份下降 26% - Rho Motion
item.description: Global electric vehicle sales jumped 69% in January from a year earlier but were down 26% from December, reflecting subsidy cuts or tighter rules in Germany and France and seasonally weaker sales in China, market research firm Rho Motion said on Wednesday.翻译:市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周三表示，1 月份全球电动汽车销量同比增长 69%，但较 12 月份下降 26%，反映出德国和法国的补贴削减或更严格的规定以及中国销量的季节性疲软。
item.author: Nick Carey
